metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8010 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Classic-UI with the CSVexport link and pagination feature in Icinga before 1.14 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the query string tocgi-bin/status.cgi.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icinga - 1.13.4-2build1
icinga-cgi - 1.13.4-2build1
icinga-cgi-bin - 1.13.4-2build1
icinga-common - 1.13.4-2build1
icinga-core - 1.13.4-2build1
icinga-idoutils - 1.13.4-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icinga package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.4-2build1').
